title: CDPR: Cyberpunk 2077 Has No Pre-Order Bonus So That Everyone Can Get The “Same Content”

author: Psycold
PikeOffBerk
text: Bioware didn't just sort of slowly turn into something bad - it was bought out and poisoned from above. Essentially everything from Mass Effect 1/DAO onwards shows the ol' EAitice symptoms.

author: w4n
text: Yep. BioWare didn't just randomly turn to shit. It began after they were acquired by EA. I'm not saying that EA is necessarily at fault here, but it's curious how many times this exact cycle has happened with EA-bought studios.

author: VenomB
text: EA is totally at fault. EA has a huge track record of buying up devs and turning them into shells of the loving game makers they once were.

author: Alex_Havok_Summers
text:
My guy they work their employees half to death. They're already the bad guy.

Also the reason they're doing shit like this in the first place is because there is currently a lot of controversy over preorder content and the like, and as such they know that releasing a game that does not contain stuff like that is what appeals to the market at the moment. If we were a few years ago and consumers hadn't become wary enough yet not to get distracted by shiny preorder content, it is almost certainly exactly what they'd do.
